pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:0.2: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:0.5: 91. The training rule on rainy-season robes
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.1: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.2: he allowed the rainy-season robe for the monks.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.4: Knowing this, the monks from the group of six wore rainy-season robes that were inappropriate in size.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.5: As they were walking about, they were dragging them along, both in front and behind.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.6: The monks of few desires complained and criticized those monks,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.7: “How can the monks from the group of six wear such rainy-season robes?” …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.8: “Is it true, monks, that you do this?”
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.11: “… Foolish men, how can you do this?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.12: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.13: And, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.14.1: ‘If a monk is having a rainy-season robe made, it should be made the right size.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.15: This is the right size: six standard handspans long and two-and-a-half wide.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:1.16: If it exceeds that, it is to be cut down, and he commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.2: it is for use during the four months of the rainy season.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.4: making it himself or having someone else make it, it should be made to the right size.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.5: This is the right size: six standard handspans long and two and a half wide.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.6: If he makes one or has one made that exceeds that, then for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.7: When he obtains it, it is to be cut down, and he is then to confess an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.8.1: If he finishes what he began himself, he commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.9: If he has others finish what he began himself, he commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.10: If he finishes himself what was begun by others, he commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.11: If he has others finish what was begun by others, he commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.12: If he makes one or has one made for the benefit of someone else, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.13: If he obtains one that was made by someone else and then uses it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.15: if he makes it the right size;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.16: if he makes it less than the right size;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.17: if he obtains one made by another that exceeds the right size and then cuts it down before using it;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.18: if he makes a canopy, a floor cover, a cloth screen, a mattress, or a pillow;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.20: if he is the first offender.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc91:2.21: The ninth rule, the training rule on rainy-season robes, is finished.
